job.title: Software Engineer - 2022 New Grad
job.description: Vise is an investment management platform built for financial advisors Founded in 2016 Vise gives advisors the tools and technology they need to grow their business and help clients achieve their goals By empowering advisors Vise advances its mission of creating financial freedom for everyone Vise is backed by Sequoia Capital Founders Fund Bond Capital and Ribbit Capital and recently completed a Series C funding roundbrbrWe are looking for curious and execution focused Software Engineers to help solve real problems that our users face Depending on the team this includes features such as portfolio intelligence amp explainability of our algorithm the systems and tools that Vise uses and user experience We hold our product to a high standard valuing correctness quality and trustworthiness to reflect the values of the users we serve Our engineering organization is built around three principles Inclusivity Trustworthiness amp Strive for Excellence We embody an open collaborative and inclusive spirit and we value autonomy with accountability to learn amp grow from both our wins and mistakes strongThis role can be based in San Francisco CA or New York NYbrbrstrongCheck out our Intern amp New Grad FAQ page httpsuniVISErtysplashthatcombrbrstrongstrongWhat you will ownbrstrongstrongulli Work on crossfunctional projects directly collaborating with other engineers and teams in Product Design and Quant lili Build the skills to own a project from beginning to end learning project management and technical leadership skills from some of the best engineers in the industry lili Participate in giving feedback on code reviews and technical designs liul strongstrongWhat you will bring on Day 1brstrongstrongulli A degree in Computer Science or a directly related field by 2022 or equivalent work experience lili Experience either in internships or working collaboratively on multiperson coding projects in a professional setting lili Eager to learn unfamiliar systems and curiosity for the fintech space lili Fluent in English brbrliulstrongOur stackstrong Go Python Postgres Express TypeScript Node React Redux and AWSbrbrVise celebrates and embraces diversity and is committed to building a team that represents a variety of experiences backgrounds and skills We do not discriminate on the basis of race color religion marital status age gender identity gender expression sexual orientation nondisqualifying physical or mental disability national origin veteran status or other applicable legally protected characteristics
